version_description: Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

- New AR camera feature! Choose a character, turn on the AR mode and watch your head turn into a Chumoji!

- Now you can unlock all the exclusive Chumoji for FREE!
1. Make a video review of Chudo
2. Upload it to YouTube
3. Email us the link to the video at hello@chu.do
4. Receive promo codes for all Chumoji

- Now all Chumoji have tongues! Tongue detection is available for all characters!

- New AR camera feature! Choose a character, turn on the AR mode and watch your head turn into a Chumoji!

- Now you can unlock all the exclusive Chumoji for FREE!
1. Make a video review of Chudo
2. Upload it to YouTube
3. Email us the link to the video at hello@chu.do
4. Receive promo codes for all Chumoji

NEW CRAZY FEATURE
Update the app, flip your tongue in different directions, and see what happens!
Chudo Messenger is the one and only app that supports multi-directional tongue detection! Try it out!

Unlock all of the paid characters for FREE by inviting friends to Chudo!
Follow the simple guidelines in the app to participate in the challenge and get rewarded.

最新版本新增了角色并进行了一些性能优化。
邀请好友使用Chudo，免费解锁所有付费Chumoji！
按照应用中的简单说明进行操作，参与活动并获得奖励。

Chudo中新增人形卡通角色啦！马上下载最新APP版本，体验专属自己的数字卡通形象。
* 通过每一次应用更新，我们不断改进并完善拟人化技术。敬请关注！
- Stability improvements and other bug-fixes.

* The latest version also includes performance improvements and bug fixes. We continue to enhance our technologies with each and every app update. Stay tuned for more!

New awesome features:
- Double stickers in chats: invite your friends, message them, and interact with their avatars using the new double stickers!
- Avatar customizer: edit your character’s hairstyle, eyes, colors, eyebrows, mustache and beard, glasses, and even makeup!

* The latest version also includes performance improvements and bug fixes. We continue to enhance our technologies with each and every app update. Stay tuned for more!

– Check out the new iMote suggest feature! Type any word or emoji and a relevant iMote will pop up.
